thread.title: Armed deputy at Florida school resigns after failing to engage shooter

title: Armed deputy at Florida school resigns after failing to engage shooter
text:
Armed deputy at Florida school resigns after failing to engage shooter 7:12pm IST - 01:21 
The armed deputy assigned to the campus of a Florida high school during a deadly shooting last week stayed outside the building during the attack and failed to engage the shooter, the county sheriff said on Thursday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   armed deputy assigned to the campus of a Florida high school during a deadly shooting last week stayed outside the building during the attack and failed to engage the shooter, the county sheriff said on Thursday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2EKe9yy
